alert.note: Alert for Deltana and Tanana Flats (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued June 06 at 6:08AM AKDT until June 06 at 10:00PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 10 PM AKDT THIS EVENING FOR DELTANA AND TANANA FLATS... * AFFECTED AREA...Near the Richardson Highway from Delta Junction south. * TIMING...From 2 PM this afternoon to 10 PM AKDT this evening. Red Flag conditions possible again Wed afternoon. * WINDS...South 15 mph. * HUMIDITY...As low as 20 percent. * TEMPERATURES...In the mid 70s. * IMPACTS...Rapid ignition, growth and spread of fires are possible.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that conditions are occurring or will occur which could lead to the development of large and dangerous fires. It is directed toward fire agencies, and through them, to the public. Please advise the appropriate officials or fire crews in the field of this Red Flag Warning.
